body: I have no idea what exactly clansa re and how I can join one. Can u clear me and perhaps others up? :)
body_tagged: I have no idea what exactly clansa re and how I can join one. Can u clear me and perhaps others up? :)
title: Clans

replies.body:
If you go here:
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=48
You should find a bunch of topics that people have created for their clan. For most clans you would have to fill out an application in the comments of thier thread and wait for a response from the clan.
